extendedInfo.description: Scuba Deco Table is a simple app for SCUBA divers to calculate decompression stops.It uses CMAS DECO 2000 table, limited by 42 meters depth. Decompression calculations assume that your vertical speed is 10m/min.You can e-mail your suggestions to : canbu [at] canbu [dot] info*** WARNING ***In case of usage of this application, User will be responsible for his/her behavior. Even the app is tested, there may be calculation errors. Any damage you take while before, during or after diving is at your responsibility.*** WARNING ***
